summary.span: 许多 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 功能都需要使用缓冲区，然而创建和销毁缓冲区的造价非常高。

span.span: Many Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) features require the use of buffers, which are expensive to create and destroy.

summary.span: 您可以使用 类来管理缓冲池。

span.span: You can use the class to manage a buffer pool.

summary.span: 缓冲池及其缓冲区是在实例化此类时创建，在垃圾回收将缓冲池回收时销毁。

span.span: The pool and its buffers are created when you instantiate this class and destroyed when the buffer pool is reclaimed by garbage collection.

summary.span: 每次需要使用缓冲区时，您就可以从缓冲池中取出一个缓冲区来进行使用，然后在使用完毕后将其返回到缓冲池。

span.span: Every time you need to use a buffer, you take one from the pool, use it, and return it to the pool when done.

summary.span: 这个过程要比每次需要使用缓冲区时就创建一个然后再销毁快得多。

span.span: This process is much faster than creating and destroying a buffer every time you need to use one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类通常用于实现自定义编码器或自定义传输通道。This class is commonly used while implementing custom encoders or custom transport channels.
